page.title: 20Concerns in Stamford Bridge
page.content: A high security prison being built at the nearby village of Full Sutton is giving concern to some of the villagers.Some are worried about the risk of escaped inmates. Others are more concerned about the visitors to the prison who will travel through Stamford Bridge,as there are no facilities for them,especially if they have young children. River Derwent: Pressure is being applied to allow more boats on the river.Some villagers believe that more people should benifit from the beautiful scenery along its banks.Others believe that noise and litter will spoil the peace and beauty of the river.They are also worried that the wildlife on the river will be threatened.The R.Derwent is one of the few rivers with otters living on its banks.It is also one of the cleanest rivers in England.
